channel.title: CVE Feed for Martem -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Martem -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-10609|2024-09-16T18:34:17.545Z -- martem -- telem-gw6%2Fgwm
item.description: Martem TELEM GW6 and GWM devices with firmware 2018.04.18-linux_4-01-601cb47 and prior allow improper sanitization of data over a Websocket which may allow cross-site scripting and client-side code execution with target user privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-10607|2024-09-16T21:57:37.516Z -- martem -- telem%20gw6
item.description: Martem TELEM GW6 and GWM devices with firmware 2018.04.18-linux_4-01-601cb47 and prior allow the creation of new connections to one or more IOAs, without closing them properly, which may cause a denial of service within the industrial process control channel.
